channel.title: Owners/admins still lose their items in pking?
channel.description: Yeah, I was pking with some friends in my server, and I died. No big deal, I thought, until I saw I lost my stuff, even though I'm the owner. How can I fix this?

item.title: Owners/admins still lose their items in pking?
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

or you could make an exception in the pking area, where it says oh dear you died… you could do something like else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name") {
idk it would prolly be something like that… Idk… new coder… but have been tryin to get the hang of this crap… so…

Read full topic
